Ayurvedic therapies like Shirodhara that inculcate specific herbs can help relax the mind and quell disorders like insomnia. Speak to our practitioners at the Favourite Kerala Ayurveda & Spa of The Raviz Kovalam to know about Ayurveda’s lifestyle strategies in the treatment of sleep disorders based on your constitution and individual situation.

Contact us for Ayurveda & Spa packages @The Raviz Kovalam. Call us @ 0471 3051234
